content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking, given its prime location and modern amenities. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I don't have a lot of money. Therefore, I was thinking of an amount that I can afford. How about 500 euros?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Yi-Nuo, but 500 euros is much lower than my asking price. The location of this apartment and the amenities it offers justify a higher rent. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, Mister Schmidt. I understand that the apartment is in a great location and has good amenities. How about 700 euros?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 700 euros is more in line with what I had in mind. However, considering the current demand for apartments in the city center, I think we can do even better. Would you be willing to go a little higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, Mister Schmidt. I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible, but I also understand that it's a great apartment in a great location. How about 750 euros?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 750 euros is a fair offer, but I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate the value of this apartment. Would you be willing to go up to 800 euros? This would reflect the quality of the property and the services provided.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt. I agree to the price of 800 euros!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 800 euros! Let's proceed with the lease agreement. Would you like to sign a one-year or a two-year contract?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: A two-year contract would be fine with me, Mister Schmidt.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Great, Yi-Nuo. I'll prepare the lease agreement for a two-year term. We'll need to discuss the deposit, maintenance responsibilities, and other terms and conditions. Would you like to proceed with that discussion now, or do you have any other questions?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's proceed with the discussion now, Mister Schmidt.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Very well. First, let's address the deposit. I require two months' rent as a security deposit. This is standard practice in the industry and ensures that the apartment is returned in good condition at the end of the lease. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, Mister Schmidt, that is acceptable to me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Excellent. Maintenance responsibilities are as follows: I am responsible for structural repairs and common area maintenance. You are responsible for any damages caused by yourself or your guests, and for the upkeep of the interior of the apartment. This includes fixing any issues that arise with the appliances provided. Is this clear?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, Mister Schmidt, I understand the maintenance responsibilities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Good. We also have a strict no-smoking policy in the apartment. This includes both tobacco and marijuana. Additionally, pets are not allowed, as I want to maintain the pristine condition of the apartment. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, Mister Schmidt, I agree to the no-smoking policy and the pet policy.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Fantastic. Now, regarding the lease itself, I require a two-year commitment with a one-month notice period for either party to terminate the lease. This gives us both some flexibility should circumstances change. Does this work for you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, Mister Schmidt, that works for me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Wonderful. We are almost done with the lease agreement. I will prepare the contract for your review. Once you sign it, we can proceed with the deposit and the first month's rent. Do you have any other questions or concerns before we finalize the agreement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, Mister Schmidt, I don't have any other questions or concerns.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Excellent. I'll send you the lease agreement via email within the next few days. Once you've reviewed it and signed it, we can meet to exchange the necessary documents and payments. Is there anything else you would like to discuss?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, Mister Schmidt, I don't have anything else to discuss. I look forward to receiving the lease agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Fantastic, Yi-Nuo. I'll make sure to send it to you as soon as possible. Thank you for your time and for choosing my apartment. I'm sure you'll be very happy here. Is there anything else you need assistance with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
No, Mister Schmidt, everything is taken care of. Thank you for your help and your time.

[response]
TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
